Package StyleSheets.BaseComponents

Class RuleSet

java.lang.Object
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.Implementation.Statement
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.RuleSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlexBox, Grid
public class RuleSet
extends Statement
Defines a CSS rule set containing a selector and multiple declarations.

  • Field Summary
